title: Champion Rotation Size

embed.description: Greetings Summoners! Here are this week's free champions:

body:
The usual amount of champions that are available to play as is 10 per rotation, however with the current rotation the available champions are instead 20.
Is there any reason behind the increase for this week or is it just a thing which happens that I've never noticed.

replies.body:
The Hunt of the Blood Moon looms into rotation from 2/10/17 - 2/14/17 and 2/17/17 - 2/21/17. Sacrifice Spirits, Demon Heralds, and enemy champions to gain points and the Demon Brand buff, which turns you invisible to hunt down your enemies.

Only 20 of the most vicious champions are available for the Hunt (10 of which will be lurking in the Free to Play rotation).

Look out for more information as the blood moon approaches. Happy hunting.

There's the upcoming Featured Gamemode, _Hunt of the Blood Moon_, which allows players to pick from a specific pool of champions (which includes certain Assassins, Skirmishers and Divers, for the most part).


You can read more about the gamemode here:
http://www.surrenderat20.net/p/73-pbe-cycle.html#blood
I think that the extra ten are for the new blood moon game mode, cuz all of them are assassins.
